snippet: A reporter tries out Immersion, a project by M.I.T.’s Media Laboratory that looks at who you’re corresponding with via e-mail and stitches it together into an interactive graphic.
abstract: A reporter tries out Immersion, a project by M.I.T.’s Media Laboratory that looks at who you’re corresponding with via e-mail and stitches it together into an interactive graphic.

headline.main: Using E-Mail Data to Connect the Dots of Your Life
